entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 06 March 2023
